availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Burrell Burchett, Sr. (Carter County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Easterling Burchett. Father of John Burchett, Elizabeth Burchett, Benjamin Burchett, Nancy Burchett, Thomas Burchett, Silas Burchett, Drury Burchett, Burrell Burchett, Jr., Ann Burchett, and Susannah Burchett. Farmer in Carter County in 1850. Farmer in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, District 2, p. 216A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 248.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, Precinct 1, p. 95B.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 12481.
"John Burrell Burchett (1805-1882)," Find A Grave, Memorial 113817836, accessed November 21, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/113817836.
